sentences.sContent: Can I have a glass of water? I’m really thirsty.
sentences.sCn: 我能喝一杯水吗？ 我太渴了。

sentences.sContent: He’d been working in the garden and was very hot and thirsty.
sentences.sCn: 他一直在花园里干活，又热又渴。

sentences.sContent: All this digging is thirsty work (= work that makes you want a drink ) .
sentences.sCn: 这种挖地的活干了让人口渴。

synos.tran: 口渴的，口干的；渴望的，热望的

trans.tranOther: feeling that you want or need a drink
